Package com.dacm.hexagonal.application.service

Class SpaceServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.dacm.hexagonal.application.service.SpaceServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpaceService
@Service public class SpaceServiceImpl extends Object implements SpaceService
Service class for managing spaces.

This class handles business logic related to space entities. It interacts with the MongoDB database through the SpaceRepository and MongoTemplate.

    • SpaceServiceImpl

      @Autowired public SpaceServiceImpl(SpaceRepository spaceRepository, org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoTemplate mongoTemplate)
      Constructs a new SpaceServiceImpl with necessary dependencies.
      Parameters:
      spaceRepository - the repository for space data interaction
      mongoTemplate - the MongoDB operations template

  • Method Details

    • save

      public ApiResponse save(Space space)
      Saves a new space record to the database. This method converts a SpaceDto DTO to a SpaceEntity which is then saved into the database using the SpaceRepository. After the save operation, it returns an indicating the success of the operation.
      Specified by:
      save in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      space - the SpaceDto DTO containing the data to be saved. This data includes identifiers, names, descriptions, capacity, amenities, availability status, and location.
      Returns:
      an containing the status code, message, HTTP status, and the timestamp of the operation. It returns HTTP status 200 and a success message if the operation is successful.

    • saveMultipleSpaces

      public AddedResponse saveMultipleSpaces(Space[] spaces)
      Saves multiple space entities to the database. Processes an array of SpaceEntity, attempting to save each to the database. It checks if the space ID already exists to prevent duplicates. The method accumulates successful saves and errors, returning detailed information about the results of these operations.
      Specified by:
      saveMultipleSpaces in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaces - the array of SpaceEntity to be saved
      Returns:
      AddedResponse containing details of operation results, including success status, total number of attempts, count of successes, failures, and lists of added spaces and failed attempts.

    • updateSpace

      public ApiResponse updateSpace(String spaceId, SpaceDto spaceRecord)
      Updates an existing space in the database based on the provided space ID and space record.

      This method first retrieves the existing space by space ID. If not found, it throws an exception. It checks if the new space ID from the provided space record is already in use and returns an error if so. Otherwise, it updates the space entity with new values and saves it back to the repository.

      Specified by:
      updateSpace in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceId - the ID of the space to update
      spaceRecord - the new space details to update
      Returns:
      ApiResponse indicating the result of the operation. It returns a success message and status code 200 if the update is successful, or an error message and status code 400 if the space ID is already in use.

    • deleteBySpaceId

      public ApiResponse deleteBySpaceId(String spaceId)
      Deletes a space entity from the database based on the provided space ID.

      Retrieves the space entity by its ID and deletes it. If no space is found with the provided ID, throws an IllegalArgumentException. This ensures that only existing spaces can be deleted.

      Specified by:
      deleteBySpaceId in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceId - the ID of the space to be deleted
      Returns:
      ApiResponse indicating the result of the deletion operation. Returns a success message and status code 200 if the deletion is successful. If the space is not found, an exception is thrown and should be handled appropriately.

    • findBySpaceId

      public SpaceDto findBySpaceId(String spaceId)
      Retrieves a space record by its space ID.

      This method searches for a space entity using the provided space ID. If found, it converts the entity to a DTO using SpaceMapper. If no entity is found, it throws an IllegalArgumentException.

      Specified by:
      findBySpaceId in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceId - the ID of the space to retrieve
      Returns:
      SpaceDto the DTO representation of the space entity

    • findAllSpaces

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<SpacePaginationResponse> findAllSpaces(String spaceName, String description, String location, String capacity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of spaces based on the provided search criteria.
      Specified by:
      findAllSpaces in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceName - The name of the space to search for.
      description - The description of the space to search for.
      location - The location of the space to search for.
      capacity - The capacity of the space to search for.
      pageable - Pagination information.
      Returns:
      A page of SpacePaginationResponse objects containing spaces matching the search criteria.

    • findAllSpacesDto

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<SpaceDto> findAllSpacesDto(String spaceName, String description, String location, String capacity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of all spaces matching the given filters. Applies filters for space name, description, location, and capacity if provided. The results are returned in a paginated format.
      Specified by:
      findAllSpacesDto in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceName - the filter for the space name
      description - the filter for the space description
      location - the filter for the space location
      capacity - the filter for the space capacity, interpreted as a string
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a paginated Page of SpaceDto matching the criteria

    • findAvailableSpaces

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<SpaceDto> findAvailableSpaces(String spaceId, String spaceName, String description, boolean available, String location, String capacity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of available spaces matching the given filters. Filters for available spaces based on space name, description, location, and capacity. Only includes spaces that are currently marked as available.
      Specified by:
      findAvailableSpaces in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceId - optional filter for space ID (currently not used in filtering)
      spaceName - the filter for the space name
      description - the filter for the space description
      available - boolean flag to include only available spaces (true) - currently hardcoded
      location - the filter for the space location
      capacity - the filter for the space capacity, interpreted as a string
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a paginated Page of SpaceDto for available spaces

    • getUnAvailableSpaces

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<SpaceDto> getUnAvailableSpaces(String spaceId, String spaceName, String description, boolean available, String location, String capacity, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of unavailable spaces matching the given filters. Filters for unavailable spaces based on space ID, name, description, location, and capacity. Only includes spaces that are currently marked as unavailable.
      Specified by:
      getUnAvailableSpaces in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      spaceId - optional filter for space ID (should be spaceName for correction)
      spaceName - the filter for the space name
      description - the filter for the space description
      available - boolean flag to include only unavailable spaces (false) - currently hardcoded
      location - the filter for the space location
      capacity - the filter for the space capacity, interpreted as a string
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a paginated Page of SpaceDto for unavailable spaces

    • getAllSpaceNames

      public List<String> getAllSpaceNames()
      Retrieves a list of all unique space IDs from the database. This method fetches all space entities, extracts their IDs, and returns a list of unique IDs. It uses a HashSet to ensure that all IDs in the returned list are distinct.
      Specified by:
      getAllSpaceNames in interface SpaceService
      Returns:
      a List of unique space IDs currently stored in the database

    • changeSpaceAvailability

      public void changeSpaceAvailability(SpaceEntity space, boolean available)
      Changes the availability status of a given space entity and saves the update to the database. This method sets the availability of the specified space to the provided boolean value, then persists the updated space entity to the repository.
      Specified by:
      changeSpaceAvailability in interface SpaceService
      Parameters:
      space - the space entity whose availability is to be changed
      available - the new availability status to set (true for available, false for unavailable)

    • buildSpacePaginationResponse

      public SpacePaginationResponse buildSpacePaginationResponse(org.springframework.data.domain.Page<SpaceDto> spaces)
      Specified by:
      buildSpacePaginationResponse in interface SpaceService
